summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids Review Date: 2020/09/25 Store: AUGNORYE Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'} Review Text: I really only wanted this for the cape and the scissors and the scissors are decent. I've been using them to shape the recent hair cut I gave myself. They are sharp and have a good weight to them. I have not used the thinning shears yet so I cannot speak to them. The other items in the kit are all pretty basic and cheap. I gave the thin plastic combs to my daughter to use with her dolls. The cape is thin and the strings in the back for tying seem flimsy. One of the strings is way to too making tying difficult. I have not had a need for any of the other items. I do like the storage case though...a nice compact way to keep everything together and easy to find when it is needed. Review Title: I like the scissors Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2 Pack Hair Towel Wrap Turban Microfiber Drying Shower and Bath, Twist Head Towels with Button, Magic Quick Dryer, Hair Care for Women and Girls, One Wrap Plus One Cap and Two Velvet Hair Bands Review Date: 2020/11/10 Store: MEETWIN Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {} Review Text: A lot of quality in these products. Extremely soft like a blanket or child's plush making it very comfortable to use and no stress or tension on the hair. The turbine has been great for my daughter. Much easier to get on her thick hair after it has been freshly washed. The twist towels always hurt her ears and since I wash her hair in the shower, getting her towel wrapped head in a tee shirt could at times be difficult. The turbine is easy on her ears and comfy all over. It isn't bulky making it easier to get dressed with it on after a shower.
I use the wrap towel and it works great. Really soaks up the excess water. The button and elastic loop are sturdy, they don't feel like they will fall off or snap from regular use. The scrunchies are a bonus. They too are soft and velvety. Not needed for my hair styles or my daughter's really she still loves them even just to wear on her wrist.
I have multiple wrapping hair towels but these are my new favorites. Review Title: Soft and comfortable Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Barber Hair Cutting Cape for Men Women, Made with Ultra Soft Silk Fiber, 63" x 57" Review Date: 2021/01/03 Store: SmoTecQ Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.8 x 9.2 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: Works well. Full coverage and easy to use closure- hook and eye on stretchy elastic. I don't know about it being "ultra soft", it feels like most hair cutting capes...kind of plastic like. Works for my family's needs. Review Title: Does the job Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 5pcs Nail Art Liner Brushes, Lystaii Dual-ended Painting Nail Design Brush Pen Include Liner Brushes and Dotting Pen Nail Art Point Drill Drawing Brush Double Ended Dotting Tools Set 5,7,9,11,14mm Review Date: 2021/01/10 Store: Lystaii Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.41 x 3.86 x 0.75 inches; 1.41 Ounces'} Review Text: I don't paint my nails often, but I do like the change a little polish can bring to my look. I have just made my first attempt at using gel polish and I am loving the results and longevity gels provide. I did a few simple polka dots on my nails to test out these nail tools. It worked out just fine. I like that the glitter is inside the base so that the outside is smooth to the touch. The different colors also makes it easy to differentiate between the various sizes at a glance. Next time I'll use the brush end to add some stripes. The metal end was easy to clean with just the wipe of a cotton ball. I'll clean the brush side with soap a water when using gels and acetone when using regular polish. Review Title: Easy to use for a beginner Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Microfiber Hair Towels - 5 Towel Set – 5 Beautiful Colors - Great for all Hair Types - Size (10 x 26 inches) Lightweight, Absorbent, and Ultra Soft. Colors Rose, Pink, Gray, Blue, and Lilac. Review Date: 2021/07/19 Store: AViBNiUM Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AViBNiUM', 'Towel form type': 'Hair Towel', 'Age Range (Description)': 'All Ages', 'Material': 'Microfiber', 'Product Dimensions': '26"L x 10"W', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 10 x 3 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '860005528004'} Review Text: Light weight, absorbent and wash and dry well. Very soft and comfortable to wear. The elastic hoop and be a little annoying to get around the button when working blindly, but not enough to dislike these hair towels. Review Title: Soft and drying Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Think Nature Orange Blossom Shampoo, No Sulfate Paraben, All hair types16.9fl.oz(500ml) Review Date: 2021/09/26 Store: think nature Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Think nature', 'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Hair Type': 'All Hair Types16.9fl.oz,All Hair Types', 'Scent': 'Citrus,Orange', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.7 x 7.8 inches; 1.06 Pounds'} Review Text: This smells amazing. It is very gentle. I find that I need to lather more than once to get that clean feeling that I'm looking for though. The scent is a light citrus. Review Title: Smells amazing Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face Review Date: 2021/12/03 Store: Cuckoo Product Description: ['Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller', 'Why choose Cuckoo?', 'Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller. The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times. The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.', 'Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller', 'Prefect Oil Absorption Effect', 'Like oil-absorbing paper, but better.\xa0Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.', 'Reusable Use', 'Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.', 'Special Design', 'Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers.\xa0The oil on the face will disappear.', 'Easy To Carry', 'You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.', 'Advantage Of Jade Roller', 'Natural Rose Quartz Jade', 'Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.', 'No Crack& Scratch', "Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.", 'Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Face Roller-1', 'Manufacturer': 'Cuckoo'} Review Text: Roller does not glide as smoothly as I had hoped but it really does a great job at blotting the oily shine from my face. Small and compact about as tall as a tube of chap stick just wider. I keep it with me to use on my tzone and it really does the trick. Quicker and easier than blotting with a papertowel. The real test will come this summer. Comes with a second roller which is nice. Review Title: Shine free Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has reported several positive experiences with their purchases, particularly appreciating the quality and effectiveness of various items. The hair cutting scissors were noted for their sharpness and good weight, while the hair towel wraps were highlighted for their softness and comfort during use. The nail art tools received praise for being beginner-friendly, and the makeup oil-absorbing roller was lauded for its compact design and effectiveness at controlling shine. Overall, the user expressed satisfaction with products that integrated ease of use, comfort, and performance, leading them to prefer these items over others.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Some negative experiences were noted, mainly about certain products not meeting expectations. The hair cutting cape was described as feeling somewhat plastic and lacking the "ultra soft" quality advertised. The shampoo, despite its pleasant fragrance, required more lathering than the user desired, resulting in a less satisfying wash experience. Additionally, issues with the elastic hoop on the hair towels being difficult to maneuver were mentioned, indicating usability frustrations. Overall, the user encountered a few products that fell short of their expectations regarding quality and functionality.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's shopping experience reflects a mix of both positive and negative aspects. On the one hand, they enjoyed quality items that effectively met their needs, such as hair tools that provided comfort and ease. On the other hand, some purchases didn't align with their expectations, particularly regarding texture and performance. This contrast highlights the importance of product quality and effectiveness in shaping the user's overall satisfaction, leading to a balanced view of their shopping history.

target_interaction.title: Gag gifting
target_interaction.text: Great gag gift for a family member. They can test it out at home and see if these are really useable in the wild!
target_interaction.title_meta: Olnamo Deovie Flatulent Odor Destroyer pads Deodorant Sheet for IBS
features: This product is NOT a joke item. It was developed for people suffering from leaking Flatulent Odors, including diagnosed with IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome).

High Quality Coconut Shell Activated Carbon in Non- Woven Fabric- Powerful Absorption for Smell is 37 times higher than alternate material products using bamboo carbon. Activated Carbon has numerous micro ventilation holes for absorbing flatulent odor smells and eliminating the odor on contact.

Material is thin and Soft and can be discreetly placed between the buttocks. It is recommended to wear underpants before placing the carbon deodorant sheet on the outer rear side of the pants aligned closely towards the Anus. Deovie can be used in any type of situation! Whether you are relaxing at home, at work, or active in your daily life such as going to the gym or on the go.

Dimensions 1MM thickness Width 8.2cm, Height 15cm (ONE SIZE FITS ALL) so no matter your body size or type it will fit properly and perform efficiently and effectively when using this product. Loose or tight clothing can be worn while using this product.
Experimental trial results of Deovie- Removal of flatulent odors were Ammonia 60ppm, Methyl mercaptan 20ppm, Hydrogen sulfide 20ppm were removed to 0.
Recommended for people suffering from IBS (Gas type) or constipation, leaking and or increasing frequency of flatulent odors due to old age expulsion.
